articles.title: PAG and KKR to Acquire Sapporo Real Estate from Sapporo Holdings
articles.mainIdea: PAG and KKR to Acquire Sapporo Real Estate from Sapporo Holdings
articles.summary: Business Wire: PAG and KKR to Acquire Sapporo Real Estate from Sapporo Holdings. TOKYO, December 24, 2025--PAG and KKR to Acquire Sapporo Real Estate from Sapporo Holdings Related tickers mentioned: KKR-PD, SOOBF.
